SQL_STMT_U.val: select ItemCode, WhsCode, BinAbs, DistNumber, Sum(Qty) SumQty, Sum(Qty2) SumQtyPack from ItemHistory (nolock) where DocDate <= ':1' :2 :3 :4 :6 group by ItemCode, WhsCode, BinAbs, DistNumber :5

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,29}='' OR ISNULL({0,29}),'',' AND ItemName like '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,29})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39))
IF({0,30}='' OR ISNULL({0,30}),'',' AND DistNumber like '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,30})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39))
IF(ISNULL({0,34}) OR {0,34}=-1,' AND BplID in (Select BplID from USR6 where UserId = '&Trim(Str({32768,1},'N5'))&' ) ',' AND BplID = '&Trim(Str({0,34},'N5'))&' ')
